content.text: Jeffrey was such a nice man, a sweet, innocent type. One of my employees called him Mr. Jingles, the math teacher. Always ready to host a bowl, help a friend in need. He often volunteered to help sick children at his job, scrubbed, put on the green, the whole bit, just to do his part.
content.description: Formal dinner photo with typed character description

text_sections.full_transcription: Jeffrey was such a nice man, a sweet, innocent type. One of my employees called him Mr. Jingles, the math teacher. Always ready to host a bowl, help a friend in need. He often volunteered to help sick children at his job, scrubbed, put on the green, the whole bit, just to do his part.
